title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When a project is created, there is no confirmation or check to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
EB: Project creation should include a confirmation or check to ensure that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR: To reproduce the issue, create a new project and observe that there is no confirmation or check for scrubbing the bin directory.
